items/other/festivals/breath_of_spring/d: A special Mistrian flower that appears just before the Spring Festival.
items/other/festivals/scent_of_spring/de: This small bottle emanates a scent of breath of spring. This Spring Festival souvenir is loved by everyone.
items/other/festivals/star_brooch/descri: A beaded brooch resembling the stars. Traditionally used to invite another to Mistria's Shooting Star Festival.
